subject: get your news in QS!
msgSnippet: Hi group, I have seemed to work out a way to download the top stores, convert these stories to Quikscript, and post them on my site. The whole process is just
messageBody:
Hi group,

I have seemed to work out a way to download the top stores, convert
these stories to Quikscript, and post them on my site. The whole process
is just an experiment right now. The method I use is automatic, so I
should be able to upload the news daily, or even hourly if I wanted.

The news consists of 8 articles, and I apologize that the headlines are
slanted for Americans. The converter I use relies on a raw dictionary
that uses "Awl" where others might use "On." Normally when converting to
QS, I use a custom dictionary and add to it each time, but for the news,
which I can't read over and check, I needed a method that would convert
all words rather than convert most words perfectly.

The link is

http://quikscript.sourceforge.net/qs_news.pdf

Paul

I have seemed to work out a way to download the top stores, convert 
these stories to Quikscript, and post them on my site. The whole process

The news consists of 8 articles, and I apologize that the headlines are 
slanted for Americans. The converter I use relies on a raw dictionary 
that uses "Awl" where others might use "On." Normally when converting to 
QS, I use a custom dictionary and add to it each time, but for the news, 
which I can't read over and check, I needed a method that would convert 
all words rather than convert most words perfectly.

The link is

http://quikscript.sourceforge.net/qs_news.pdf

Paul
